nullValueSupported="true" alternativeFieldName="RQ_TARGET_REL" fieldValueType="Integer" fieldValueIsNull="false">Target Release (INTEGER) Values: [ '1001 (Release 1)', '1002 (Release 2)', '1003 (Release 3)', '1004 (1.0)' ]</field><field fieldAction="replace" fieldName="RQ_TARGET_REL_HUMAN_READABLE" fieldType="flexField" fieldValueHasChanged="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" nullValueSupported="true" alternativeFieldName="RQ_TARGET_REL_HUMAN_READABLE" fieldValueType="String" fieldValueIsNull="false">Target Release [READ-ONLY] (STRING) Values: [ '1.0', 'Release 1', alternativeFieldName="RQ_TYPE_ID" fieldValueType="String" fieldValueIsNull="false">Requirement Type (STRING) </field><field fieldAction="replace" fieldName="RQ_USER_01" fieldType="flexField" fieldValueHasChanged="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nullValueSupported="true" alternativeFieldName="RQ_USER_01" fieldValueType="String" fieldValueIsNull="false">Status Functional (STRING) Values: alternativeFieldName="RQ_VTS" fieldValueType="String" fieldValueIsNull="false">Modified (STRING) </field></artifact>
